trans-unit.source: To install updates via the Azure classic portal
trans-unit.target: To install updates via the Azure classic portal

trans-unit.source: On the **Devices** page, select the device on which you want to install updates.
trans-unit.target: On the **Devices** page, select the device on which you want to install updates.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to **Devices > Maintenance > Software Updates**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to **Devices > Maintenance > Software Updates**.

trans-unit.source: update device
trans-unit.target: update device

trans-unit.source: You see a message if the software updates are available.
trans-unit.target: You see a message if the software updates are available.

trans-unit.source: To check for updates, you can also click **Scan Updates** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: To check for updates, you can also click **Scan Updates** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: update device
trans-unit.target: update device

trans-unit.source: From the bottom of the page, click **Download Updates**.
trans-unit.target: From the bottom of the page, click **Download Updates**.

trans-unit.source: A dialog notifies the user that the update is disruptive.
trans-unit.target: A dialog notifies the user that the update is disruptive.

trans-unit.source: Given the StorSimple Virtual Array is a single node device, the device restarts after it is updated.
trans-unit.target: Given the StorSimple Virtual Array is a single node device, the device restarts after it is updated.

trans-unit.source: This disrupts any IO in progress.
trans-unit.target: This disrupts any IO in progress.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon to launch a job to download the available updates.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon to launch a job to download the available updates.

trans-unit.source: update device
trans-unit.target: update device

trans-unit.source: You are notified when the updates are downloaded.
trans-unit.target: You are notified when the updates are downloaded.

trans-unit.source: update device
trans-unit.target: update device

trans-unit.source: From the bottom of the page, click **Install Updates** to begin updating the device.
trans-unit.target: From the bottom of the page, click **Install Updates** to begin updating the device.

trans-unit.source: The dialog is presented to you again.
trans-unit.target: The dialog is presented to you again.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon to start a job to install the updates.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon to start a job to install the updates.

trans-unit.source: update device
trans-unit.target: update device

trans-unit.source: You are notified after the job is created.
trans-unit.target: You are notified after the job is created.

trans-unit.source: update device
trans-unit.target: update device

trans-unit.source: Click **View Job** link to go to the Jobs page and monitor the install status.
trans-unit.target: Click **View Job** link to go to the Jobs page and monitor the install status.

trans-unit.source: You can click **Details** at any time to get detailed information about the update job.
trans-unit.target: You can click **Details** at any time to get detailed information about the update job.

trans-unit.source: update device
trans-unit.target: update device
